dct_description_sm: Map shows roads and routes by type, railways, sights of interest, county and parish boundaries, and bauxite plants. Cities marked by population. Relief shown by spot heights. Includes inset mileage chart and area map of Caribbean, auxillary index of communities and sights of interest, index of Jamaica road signs, sightseeing guide, and maps of Ocho Rios and vicinity (1:40,000) and Port Antonio (1:26,000). Verso includes maps of Kingston and lower St. Andrew (1:34,000), Spanish Town (1:16,000), Mandeville and vicinity (1:34,000), and Montego Bay (1:22,000) with inset index to streets of Kingston. "Credit cards are not valid at Jamaican service stations." "Lithographed in U.S.A. W1271." "Based upon maps prepared by Survey Department Jamaica with the sanction of Director of Overseas Surveys."
dct_creator_sm: United States. General Drafting Co., Inc
dct_publisher_sm: Convent Station, NJ : General Drafting Co. Inc., 1972.
